SEARCH
Package HdbOfficer

Class HdbOfficerUI

java.lang.Object
HdbOfficer.HdbOfficerUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserUI<HdbOfficer,HdbOfficerRepo>
public final class HdbOfficerUI extends Object implements UserUI<HdbOfficer,HdbOfficerRepo>
User interface for managing HDB Officer functionalities. Provides methods for logging in, changing passwords, and navigating the officer dashboard.
